recipeDescription: Original pressure cooked marinated aromatic pulao rice layered with ghee serve with juicy, tender roasted chicken.
Original pressure cooked marinated tender roasted mutton served with aromatic pulao rice.
Original low flamed cooked juicy prawn served with aromatic pulao rice.
Original complicated marinated net textured deep fried flavourful roasted chicken.
Soft tender flavourful mutton semi fried.
Authentic deep fried tender marinated flavourful chicken.
